title: 求助，空岛生存插件怎么修改玩家初始箱子里的东西
author: whiteyu1314
txt_content: 求助，空岛生存插件怎么修改玩家初始箱子里的东西，我想去把冰换成水，z

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
whiteyu1314 发表于 2020-6-20 15:44
Askyblock,介个
config.yml
chestItems: 'ICE:2 MELON:1 TORCH:2 BONE:1 LAVA_BUCKET:1 PUMPKIN_SEEDS:1 SUGAR_CANE:1 RED_MUSHROOM:1 BROWN_MUSHROOM:1 CACTUS:1 BREAD:1 WHEAT:1 LEATHER_BOOTS:1 LEATHER_HELMET:1 LEATHER_CHESTPLATE:1 LEATHER_LEGGINGS:1'

把ICE换成WATER_BUCKET应该就行了

replies.txt_content:
